summary:
Lydia uses shouts and spells and is also immortal,
personalize her in any armor you want
descriptionHtml:
I'm a rookie at this, and this is my first upload don't be angry if it doesn't work send me a message on how to fix it.......... but if it does work please send me a message to let me know if it does, any other power suggestions welcome....... I made Lydia use shouts and spells and made her immortal. I found that she was way to weak for novice let alone legendary, I was sick and tired of reloading the game to keep her alive, so I gave her a boost hope you like it

[u][b]
Shouts[/b][/u]
Unrelenting Force
Call of Valor
Fire Breath
Disarm

[u][b]Spells[/b][/u]
Incinerate
Thunderbolt

[u][b]Weapon[/b][/u]
Deadric sword

[u][b]Armor[/b][/u]
Any you desire to put on her

[u][b]Health [/b][/u]
5000
[u][b]Stamina[/b][/u]
3000
[u][b]Magicka[/b][/u]
5000
author: brenton8858
